original_text: So you must not live like wild animals. Wild animals fight and they eat each other. If you live like that, be very careful! You may destroy one another completely.
korean_text: 만일 서로 물고 먹으면 피차 멸망할까 조심하라

sentences.original_text: So you must not live like wild animals
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신은 야생 동물처럼 살아서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: You may destroy one another completely
sentences.korean_translation: 당신들은 서로를 완전히 파멸시킬 수 있습니다
